meanings.definition: Disturbed or altered by living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The bioturbed soil was rich in nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The bioturbed area showed signs of animal activity.
meanings.sent3: The bioturbed garden was a playground for curious critters.
meanings.sent4: The bioturbed landscape whispered tales of hidden life.
meanings.sent5: The bioturbed ground teemed with unseen secrets.

meanings.sent1: The bioturbed of the soil was fascinating to observe.

meanings.sent3: The bioturbed of the garden was like a dance of nature.
meanings.sent4: The bioturbed of the earth was a symphony of life.
meanings.sent5: The bioturbed of the ground revealed a hidden world.

meanings.sent1: The bioturbed of the ecosystem was evident after the storm.
